privacy-description: This app will not upload any pictures to the server, all operations are completed locally.
free-description: PicGuard is free to use. No ads, no hidden costs.
cross-platform-description: Available on web, mobile and desktop.
open-source-description: The source code is publicly available. Anyone can contribute to the project.
pro-description: Includes all the features of the free version, and can also customize the font, font size and spacing.
